page.title: 16GAMES
page.content: We play many different games at school. Some consisting of two teams playing against each other where a ball is used and sometimes a bat. These are cricket and football which boys usually play, Netball, a girls game, and Rounders which interests both boys and girls. The game "touch" is a popular playtime game. It has many variations such as chaintouch, shadowtouch and balltouch. The idea is one child tries to catch other children in turn either by touching them and making them join up or by standing on their shadow or hitting them with a ball. Younger children play many imaginary games as well as marbles, hopscotch and hiding games where people or things are hidden which have to be found. girls eajoy playing handstands, skiping and many ball games involving singing rhymes.
